The twitter bootstrap is pure awsomness!

item.title: By: Pavel Forkert
item.dc:creator: Pavel Forkert
item.description: Using SimpleForm 2.0 since it wasn't even RC. Guys, you are awesome! For many people it is now MUCH easier to develop simple websites with Bootstrap and Simple Form.
item.content:encoded: Using SimpleForm 2.0 since it wasn’t even RC. Guys, you are awesome! For many people it is now MUCH easier to develop simple websites with Bootstrap and Simple Form.

item.description: you're amazing !! I love simple form !!

item.title: By: Jack Dempsey

item.description: Awesome. Love the project, think integrating with bootstrap is an excellent decision.
item.content:encoded: Awesome. Love the project, think integrating with bootstrap is an excellent decision.
